name: Won-Hyo
meaning: Dummy data for the Won-Hyo pattern used for development and testing.

moves.title: Ready Stance
moves.description: Begin in a ready stance facing 12:00.

moves.title: Front Kick
moves.description: Execute a front snap kick with the right leg towards 12:00.

moves.title: Knife-Hand Strike
moves.description: Land forward and perform a knife-hand strike towards 3:00.
